mapper.select:
select
distinct
from C_PROJ_TASK
order by ${orderByClause}

select distinct cpt.project,cpt.task_id,cpt.task_reported_name,cpt.analysis,cpt.test_number,cpt.plan_test_time,cpt.lab from c_proj_task cpt , project p where p.closed = 'F' and cpt.status = 'T' and cpt.project is not null and cpt.task_id is not null
and cpt.task_id like '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'
order by cpt.test_number desc

select
from C_PROJ_TASK where TASK_ID like '%'||#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

select cpt.task_id TASK_ID,cpt.task_reported_name TASK_REPORTED_NAME,(select full_name from lims_users where user_name = cpt.assgin_to) ASSGIN_TO, to_char(cpt.changed_on,'yyyy-mm-dd') CHANGED_ON,(select full_name from lims_users where user_name = cpt.rpt_assgin_to) RPT_ASSGIN_TO, p.c_coa_language C_COA_LANGUAGE,nvl(cpt.rpt_reject_comment_s,'无') RPT_REJECT_COMMENT_S,cpt.seq_num SEQ_NUM from c_proj_task cpt inner join project p on cpt.project = p.name where p.closed = 'F' and cpt.ready_for_review = 'T' and cpt.READY_FOR_DRAFT = 'F' and cpt.project = p.name and p.closed = 'F'
and cpt.task_id like '%'||#{_parameter}||'%'
order by CHANGED_ON desc

update C_PROJ_TASK
SEQ_NUM = #{record.seqNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROJECT = #{record.project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANALYSIS = #{record.analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGED_ON = #{record.changedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHANGED_BY = #{record.changedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_GROUP = #{record.sampleGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTED_DATE = #{record.startedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPLETED_DATE = #{record.completedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEST_NUMBER = #{record.testNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_ENTERED = #{record.isEntered,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_VARIATION = #{record.testVariation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_TEST_TIME = #{record.planTestTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_TEST_TIME = #{record.actualTestTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_NUM_BATCH = #{record.maxNumBatch,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASE_FEE = #{record.baseFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEST_FEE = #{record.testFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUOTES = #{record.quotes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_TEST_FEE = #{record.actualTestFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_TOTAL_COST = #{record.actualTotalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANALYSIS_VERSION = #{record.analysisVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_RECHECK = #{record.isRecheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECHECK_TO = #{record.recheckTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_LINK = #{record.extLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_PASS = #{record.ifPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT_TECH = #{record.commentTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEST_QUANTITY = #{record.testQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_REPORTED_NAME = #{record.taskReportedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRY_DATE = #{record.expiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASSGIN_TO = #{record.assginTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAB = #{record.lab,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDATE = #{record.redate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
READY_FOR_REVIEW = #{record.readyForReview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_ASSGIN_TO = #{record.rptAssginTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
READY_FOR_DRAFT = #{record.readyForDraft,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAFT_APPLY_ON = #{record.draftApplyOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DRAFT_APPLY_BY = #{record.draftApplyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_NUMBER = #{record.reportNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSIGNED_SAMPLE = #{record.assignedSample,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_DISPLAY = #{record.assignedSampleDisplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNED_SAMPLE_QUANTITY = #{record.assignedSampleQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDITIONAL_WORK_HOURS = #{record.additionalWorkHours,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SURCHARGE = #{record.surcharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_BASE_FEE = #{record.actualBaseFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_SURCHARGE = #{record.actualSurcharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_TEST_QTY = #{record.actualTestQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONCLUSION = #{record.conclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEWED_ON = #{record.reviewedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RPT_AUTHORIZED_BY = #{record.rptAuthorizedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_AUTHORIZED_ON = #{record.rptAuthorizedOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RPT_AUTHORIZED = #{record.rptAuthorized,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_REJECT_COMMENT_C = #{record.rptRejectCommentC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_REJECT_COMMENT_S = #{record.rptRejectCommentS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RPT_CONCLUSION = #{record.rptConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SUBMIT_BY = #{record.cSubmitBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SUBMIT_DATE = #{record.cSubmitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_CUSTOMERMANAGER_BY = #{record.cCustomermanagerBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CUSTOMERMANAGER_DATE = #{record.cCustomermanagerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_TECHSUPERVISOR_BY = #{record.cTechsupervisorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TECHSUPERVISOR_DATE = #{record.cTechsupervisorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_QUOTECREATE_BY = #{record.cQuotecreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_QUOTECREATE_DATE = #{record.cQuotecreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_QUOTESIGNATURE_BY = #{record.cQuotesignatureBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_QUOTESIGNATURE_DATE = #{record.cQuotesignatureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_QUOTESEND_BY = #{record.cQuotesendBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_QUOTESEND_DATE = #{record.cQuotesendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_SAMPLERECEIVE_BY = #{record.cSamplereceiveBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SAMPLERECEIVE_DATE = #{record.cSamplereceiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_ARRANGEMENT_BY = #{record.cArrangementBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ARRANGEMENT_DATE = #{record.cArrangementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_MONITORPROCESS_BY = #{record.cMonitorprocessBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
